Package com.googlecode.aluminumproject.finders

Configuration elements that find templates, locations to store templates, and types.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TemplateFinder
    Used by a parser to find a template by name.
    TemplateStoreFinder
    Used by a serialiser to find a location to store a template.
    TypeFinder
    Finds types in the class path, based on a filter.
    TypeFinder.TypeFilter
    The filter used by the find method.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTemplateFinder
    Abstract superclass that simplifies implementing the template finder interface.
    AbstractTemplateStoreFinder
    Makes it easier to implement the template store finder interface.
    ClassPathTemplateFinder
    Looks for templates in the class path.
    DefaultTypeFinder
    Type finder that locates types in directories and JAR files.
    FileSystemTemplateFinder
    Uses the file system to find templates.
    FileSystemTemplateStoreFinder
    Finds locations for templates on the file system.
    InMemoryTemplateStoreFinder
    A template store finder that finds in-memory output streams.

Package com.googlecode.aluminumproject.finders Description

Configuration elements that find templates, locations to store templates, and types.
